Stage 1:
['The', 'Ptolemies', 'spoke', 'Greek', 'throughout', 'their', 'dynasty', ',', 'and', 'refused', 'to', 'speak', 'Late', 'Egyptian', ',', 'which', 'is', 'the', 'reason', 'that', 'Greek', 'as', 'well', 'as', 'Egyptian', 'were', 'used', 'on', 'official', 'court', 'documents', 'such', 'as', 'the', 'Rosetta', 'Stone', '.']
The Ptolemies spoke Greek throughout their dynasty, and refused to speak Late Egyptian, which is the reason that Greek as well as Egyptian were used on official court documents such as the Rosetta Stone.
-----------------------

The name Cleopatra is derived from the Greek name Κλεοπάτρα -LRB- Kleopatra -RRB- which meant "she who comes from glorious father" or "glory of the father" in the feminine form, derived from κλέος -LRB- kleos -RRB- "glory" combined with πατήρ -LRB- pater -RRB- "father" -LRB- the masculine form would be written either as Kleopatros -LRB- Κλεόπατρος -RRB-, or Patroklos -LRB- Πάτροκλος -RRB- -RRB-.

Stage 1:
['After', 'studying', 'historical', 'texts', 'and', 'consulting', 'with', 'toxicologists', ',', 'the', 'historian', 'concluded', 'that', 'the', 'asp', 'could', 'not', 'have', 'caused', 'the', 'quick', 'and', 'pain-free', 'death', 'claimed', 'by', 'most', 'sources', ',', 'since', 'the', 'asp', 'venom', 'paralyses', 'parts', 'of', 'the', 'body', ',', 'starting', 'with', 'the', 'eyes', ',', 'before', 'causing', 'death', '.']
After studying historical texts and consulting with toxicologists, the historian concluded that the asp could not have caused the quick and pain-free death claimed by most sources, since the asp venom paralyses parts of the body, starting with the eyes, before causing death.
-----------------------

Cleopatra was  a          member  of the Ptolemaic dynasty  ,     a     Greek  family  of Macedonian         origin that ruled  Egypt  after         Alexander the  Great           's  death  during the Hellenistic period  .

The     Ptolemies spoke Greek throughout their     dynasty  ,  and refused  to speak Late     Egyptian  ,  which  is  the     reason that Greek  as      well       as     Egyptian were used  on official court documents such  as the Rosetta Stone  .

The     Ptolemies spoke Greek throughout their         dynasty  ,  and refused  to speak Late         Egyptian  ,  which  is    the            reason that  Greek   as           well            as          Egyptian were   used     on   official  court  documents   such   as   the   Rosetta Stone  .

   NNP    VBZ   VBN    IN   DT   JJ   NN      NN     WDT   VBD   `` PRP  WP   VBZ   IN     JJ          NN    ''  CC  ``   NN   IN       DT       NN    ''  IN  DT    JJ     NN   ,    VBN    IN    NN   ``   NN   ''   VBN     IN    NN   ``   NN    ''  . 
    |      |     |     |    |    |    |       |       |     |    |   |   |     |    |      |           |     |   |   |    |    |        |        |     |   |   |     |      |    |     |     |     |    |    |    |     |      |     |    |    |     |   |  
Cleopatra  is derived from the Greek name Κλεοπάτρα which meant  `` she who  comes from glorious     father  ''  or  `` glory  of      the     father  ''  in the feminine form  ,  derived from κλέος  `` glory  '' combined with πατήρ  `` father  ''  .

   NNP    VBZ   VBN    IN   DT    JJ    NN      NN     WDT   VBD     ``     PRP    WP    VBZ    IN     JJ              NN    ''    CC      ``      NN    IN             DT             NN    ''  IN  DT    JJ     NN     ,      VBN      IN     NN     ``     NN   ''   VBN       IN      NN      ``     NN    ''  .

Cleopatra  is derived from the  Greek  name Κλεοπάτρα which meant    ``     she   who   comes  from glorious         father  ''    or      ``    glory   of            the           father  ''  in the feminine form    ,    derived   from  κλέος    ``   glory  '' combined   with   πατήρ     ``   father  ''  .

 In      50  BC March  51  BC came into serious     conflict with the     Gabiniani  ,  powerful Roman troops  of Aulus     Gabinius who  had  left them  in Egypt the Gabiniani  ,  powerful Roman troops  of Aulus     Gabinius who  had  left them  in     Egypt  to protect Ptolemy XII Auletes after his      restoration  to the     throne  in  55      BC protect Ptolemy XII Auletes after Ptolemy XII Auletes  '  restoration  to the     throne  in March      51  BC  .

  IN    VBG        JJ          NNS   CC    VBG      IN           NNS       ,    JJ       NN       NNP      NNP       VBD     IN   DT       NN   MD   RB  VB   VBN    DT   JJ   CC      JJ      NN    VBN    IN JJS        NNS    ,    IN   DT  NN   NN     NNS     NNS   IN  DT      NN   ,    VBG     IN       DT     NNS   ,    IN     VBG         NN   . 
  |      |         |            |    |      |       |             |        |    |        |         |        |         |      |    |        |    |    |   |     |     |    |    |       |       |      |     |   |          |     |    |    |   |    |       |       |    |   |       |    |     |      |        |       |    |    |       |          |    |  
After studying historical     texts and consulting with     toxicologists  ,  German historian Christoph Schaefer concluded that  an      asp could not have caused the quick and  pain-free death claimed  by most     sources  ,  since the asp venom paralyses parts  of the     body  ,  starting with     the     eyes  ,  before causing     death  .

  IN    VBG        JJ           NNS    CC    VBG      IN           NNS       ,    JJ       NN       NNP      NNP       VBD     IN   DT           NN   MD   RB  VB   VBN    DT   JJ   CC      JJ      NN    VBN    IN   JJS         NNS    ,    IN   DT    NN     NN     NNS     NNS   IN    DT        NN   ,    VBG     IN             DT       NNS   ,    IN     VBG         NN   . 
  |      |         |             |     |      |       |             |        |    |        |         |        |         |      |    |            |    |    |   |     |     |    |    |       |       |      |     |     |           |     |    |    |     |      |       |       |    |     |         |    |     |      |              |         |    |    |       |          |    |  
After studying historical      texts  and consulting with     toxicologists  ,  German historian Christoph Schaefer concluded that  an          asp could not have caused the quick and  pain-free death claimed  by   most      sources  ,  since the   asp   venom paralyses parts  of   the       body  ,  starting with           the       eyes  ,  before causing     death  .

After studying historical          texts    and   consulting   with          toxicologists  ,  German historian Christoph Schaefer concluded that  an          asp could not have caused the quick    and    pain-free death claimed  by   most          sources  ,  since the   asp    venom  paralyses parts    of     the           body  ,  starting with           the           eyes  ,  before causing          death   . 

None

    |        |     |           |    |      |      |     |         |      |    |   |             |     |     |       |               |             |     |    |   |      |        |        |                     |        |     |        |      |      |       |       |       |             |              |     |   |  
  Later      in   the         work  ,   however   ,  Plutarch indicates that  `` her          beauty  ,     as      we             are           told   ,   was  in   itself  neither altogether           incomparable  ,    nor      such    as     to    strike  those    who           saw            her    .   ''

Cassius     Dio also spoke  of Cleopatra      's allure  :   `` For Cleopatra was  a      woman  of surpassing     beauty  ,  and  at that     time  ,   when  Cleopatra was  in the      prime  of Cleopatra      's youth  ,  Cleopatra was most      striking  ;  Cleopatra also possessed  a  most      charming voice and knowledge  of  how    to  make Cleopatra agreeable      to      everyone  .
